title: Ticket #4042: RFE:  implement timings for various phases within Phase 4 Duration
description:
(from downstream rfe)

Provide a timing stats that correspond to various stages within Phase 4. This is to help resolve utilization/performance problems.

...

Ideally what I'm trying to get in a Phase4Duration breakdown are answers to questions like:

What percentage time is being spent in the negotiator vs. in communication with the schedd's? If the negotiator is spending all it's Phase4 time not communicating, there's likely a code problem.

How much time am I spending in each schedd? Is there a particular schedd that I'm spending all of my time in? Was I experiencing communication problems with that schedd in addition to spending lots of time with it, and how much wait time was introduced due to communications recovery?

How much time is being lost to rejections vs. valid matches?

Today we just get 1 number, total time spent.
remarks:
2013-Nov-05 15:16:45 by tannenba:
Combined this RFE into #4041 and renamed #4041 to be 'add negotiator statistics and counters', thus I am abandoning this ticket.
creator: eje
